name: Human Machine Collaboration Arena
description: Hello dear human and welcome to the world of human-machine collaboration (HMC)! In this arena, you can learn about the history of HMC from our wonderful knowledge-bots!. Let's turn back the clock a couple of hundred years and see what role AI played in web design in the early 21st century. Use the arrow keys to navigate and the space bar to jump. When you approach a bot, it will tell you something interesting related to AI web design. Find them all to score up!
